name: iim.vim
description:
This is a syntax highlighting script for the iMacros scripting language:
http://wiki.imacros.net/Main_Page
install_details:
Zip file contains:
plugin/iim.vim
syntax/iim.vim

Both need to be dropped in your VIM runtimepath.
plugin/iim.vim is just for automatically setting the filetype so that any .iim files will have this syntax highlighting applied.
syntax/iim.vim is the syntax file itself.

versions.release_notes: Added a couple more highlight groups and changed around some of the colour associations so they work better with 256 colour color-schemes.
